cause.description:
In 1993 scientists discovered that children with SLO/RSH Syndrome are unable to make cholesterol, an essential nutrient that is not provided by the mother to the baby before birth. Because the body also makes most of its own cholesterol after birth, children with SLO/RSH Syndrome continue to have trouble with development and general health after birth.
1. SLOS deserve the same funding as other causes recieve.
cause.name: Smith-Lemli-Opitz Syndrome (SLOS)
